com.lukflug.panelstudio.layout

Class SearchableLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.layout.SearchableLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IScrollSize, ILayout

    public class SearchableLayout
extends java.lang.Object
implements ILayout, IScrollSize
    Adds components in a tab-based layout, where modules are organized flat (categories bypassed), with a search bar.
